document_data.name: Cell Adjustment
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cell adjustment''''' was a restorative [[psionic]] power of the [[psychometabolism]] [[discipline]].
document_data.Effects: If successful, those touched by the user would have their wounds healed and any non-[[magic]]al [[disease]]s cured, though it could only do one or the other. In addition, unnatural diseases such as [[mummy rot]] and [[lycanthropy]] would not be cured.

Notable Users.Individuals:
* [[Ralayn]], an outcast [[alhoon]].
* [[Vhondryl]], a psionicist in [[Skullport]] and head of the [[Hall of Mental Splendor]]{{Cite dragon/172/Seeing the Sights in Skullport|12, 14, 88}}
Notable Users.Races & Sentient Creatures:
* ''Cell adjustment'' was one of the psionic powers that all [[baku]] were innately able to use.
* Some [[phoenix]]es were innately capable of using ''cell adjustment'' once per day.
* Some [[yochlol]] were innately capable of using ''cell adjustment'', but only while in their [[humanoid]] form.

document_data.Trivia: ''[[Tessadyle robe]]s'' conferred ''cell adjustment'' upon their wearers for use once per day on themselves.{{Cite dragon/255/The New Illithid Arsenal|29}}
